channel.title: alternative on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in alternative on Rusland 1

item.title: The Retuses 3x
item.description: Омут Title and opening track of the latest (?) release by The Retuses, in 2019. Lyrics Lyrics with translation Уходи Lyrics Chords Live in Kiev (2016) Шаганэ From the talk show Профилактика, 27-01-2012

item.title: До свиданья, дорогая!
item.description: Я СМЕЛЕЙ (2019) I am braver – from their first and only album Себя потерял (2019). A world of colorful paints But I am just a shadow Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver

item.title: Пионерлагерь Пыльная Радуга (ППР)
item.description: Тяжело и медленно (Heavy and Slow) (2013) Heavy and slow. Not so much the music (though it leans that way), but worse. The days, how they pass. Day after day. Тяжело и медленно, проходит день за днём. (Heavy and slow, day after day goes by.

item.title: Shokalsky Revenge
item.description: The band (or duo) is no longer active, but this is not a bad legacy. The first three tracks can be found on Репортаж с места событий (2016). 28 Also appeared on the compilation Ты Quoi (Чудесаунд) (2019): Spotify, YouTube.

item.title: Грязь – People Hatred (Я ненавижу людей)
item.description: Hating and Drowning Hating (ненавидеть) is a transitive verb – being hated does something to a person – and is therefore typically in the accusative case. But here, it’s the genitive (plural genitive) because, like it or not, people are living beings.

item.title: телеэкран (Teleekran) 4x
item.description: Капитан Радар (2020) From the Реактор EP (2020). Also featuring Плохо скрытый ужас and На радарах, which also has a live version. Lyrics available on the Bandcamp track page and here. In cryogenic sleep, birthdays pass by And films lose their meaning.

item.title: Пекинский Велосипед – Last Frame
item.description: Beijing Bicycle From Пекинский Велосипед (Peking Bicycle), based in Yekaterinburg. The band’s name also refers to a 2001 film, commonly titled Beijing Bicycle or Shiqi sui de dan che (Filmpro.ru, IMDb). Последний кадр is the opening track of the EP Не хочу забывать (Don’t Want to Forget, 2018), with the title words also appearing in the song.

item.title: Зарница – I Wanna Pet Your Dog (Корги)
item.description: Also features a reference to The Cure. Or at least, a record (пластинка) of theirs. Иди за мной, Я приведу тебя туда, Где я и ты, пластинка Cure, и нам больше некуда спешить Zarnitsa A зарница (zarnitsa) is heat lightning, but the term also has (Soviet) historical significance; see Wikipedia in English or Russian.

item.title: Хадн дадн – 900 rubles & home today (Мы сегодня дома)
item.description: So, there’s nothing revolutionary in the title and no drama. The musical arrangement, performance, lyrical scope, and variation: on all these fronts, it’s more restrained than exuberant. It’s almost fragile. But then/then again. И дорога луной озарилась вся Мы с тобой никогда не поссоримся И ладонь на слои распадается И асфальт под ногой уменьшается

item.title: Кот Балу – Words words (Слова слова)
item.description: Ночь, музыка, телефон, окно, стекло: night, music, phone, window, glass. Смерть, жизнь, книги, фильмы, любовь, надежда, вера, грехи: death, life, books, movies, love, clothes, faith, sins. And more like that. Featuring guest appearances by Chuck Palahniuk and Buddha.Чак Паланик был бы мной доволен: Chuck Palahniuk would be pleased with me.

item.title: Yanka Dyagileva
item.description: She was never able to record anything with professional sound quality, but somehow, her music doesn’t seem to suffer for it—in fact, it almost seems like it was made for this rawness. It was difficult to choose just three tracks, so there are seven.

item.title: Lucidvox 3x
item.description: They played in 2019 in Amsterdam (OCCII), Rotterdam (WORM), and at Welcome to The Village in Leeuwarden. It looked something like this, though it probably sounded even better. Беглец Runaway (Беглец) is the second preview for an album later this year (2020), ‘We Are (мы есть)’.

item.title: Джизус – Girl in the Class
item.description: Kurt Cobain It’s not like he keeps his name a secret. It’s the title of a track by Джизус (or Dzhizus). Hear/see Kozhikhov Vladislav Dmitrievich (2019) on YouTube (or listen on Spotify) since it’s not allowed here. И я лишь хочу вам помочь, как мне помогал Курт Кобейн: I just want to help you, like Kurt Cobain helped me.

item.title: Lemonday – I Sniff
item.description: Cold, cold, cold Words that are repeated: Я нюхаю я нюхаю я очень много нюхаю: I sniff, I sniff, I sniff a lot. Or I snuff, sniff, or smell a lot, in any case, something you do when it’s cold.

item.title: MViPD – How Sweet I Am
item.description: Cool, Grand, and Great Because what am I (какой же я) besides милый (sweet)? Also классный (cool), чудесный (wonderful), and прекрасный (splendid). Too handsome (слишком красивый) for this planet (для этой планеты), and on top of all that, клёвый (cool) and великолепный (great).

item.title: Sonic Death – Space Ark
item.description: You’ll hear those words repeated, and in the video, the ark (кафчег) flies through the air. Take Me The lyrics end with a wish or plea: возьми меня с собой, забери мою боль, возьми меня с собой – take me with you, take away my pain, take me with you.

item.title: Ssshhhiiittt! – Don’t Miss Me (Не скучай)
item.description: While you keep living, I’m drowning in shit. Sorry for everything, and please, Don’t ever miss me. Text, translation From ssshhhiiittt! (3 x s, 3 x h, 3 x i, and 3 x t) from Yaroslavl. Thanks to Sergey Vasiliev, the fan who created this great фан-клип (fan clip).

item.title: Nesoglasie – The Meaning of Life
item.description: Question and Answer Смысл means meaning, жизни (from жизнь) means of life. So, The Meaning of Life is just two words. And it’s the title of this song. It begins (after the guitar) with И я не знаю, что будет завтра Может, завтра я умру.

item.title: Pasosh – Stop, Max
item.description: So stop, Макс. Макс? Ма-а-акс! (Lyrics) More about Pasosh / Пасош (from Moscow) on Wikipedia, Bandcamp, Facebook, Instagram, VK, and their website. Most of the music here is also in an R1 playlist on YouTube (in order of release).

item.title: Чёрная Речка – Monster
item.description: Чудовище (monster) is the final track of Чужие свои (2016). Here are all my treasures for you, Though they aren’t worth a penny. I will be your monster, Hidden within the human. Tekst Interestingly, the word чудовище comes from чудо (wonder).
